product_name: Therm-a-Rest Trail Pro Sleeping Pad - Women's
long_description: If comfort and ease-of-use are top priorities when it comes to your backpacking mattress, the women's Therm-a-Rest Trail Pro(TM) Sleeping Pad should be at the top of your list. Trail Pro is the warmest and most comfortable Therm-a-Rest self-inflating pad that's still light enough to take backpacking; features 2 in. of supportive loft. R-value equals 4.8; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Advanced vacuum-poured foam makes the pad lighter and more compact compared to previous versions. Straighter edges in the torso area (compared to previous versions) increase sleep surface and offer better gap-free mating with other rectangular pads. The women's Therm-a-Rest Trail Pro Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack.
short_description: If comfort and ease-of-use are top priorities when it comes to your backpacking mattress, the women's Therm-a-Rest Trail Pro(TM) Sleeping Pad should be at the top of your list.
